channel.title: API :: Juice's documentation
channel.description: This project will be named {namespace}.{feature}.Api. In this project, we will implement API that is defined in contracts and other integration services. Swagger SignalR gRPC implementation Integration event subscribing and handling Handle domain events to publish integration events If you are building a monolithic application, then you can use the internal event bus instead of external. You can also handle domain events from other domains directly instead of implementing integration events.
